title: Orangeade Recipe
description: A refreshing 'ade' made with fresh-squeezed orange juice as well as lemon.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Drinks Recipes Lemonade Recipes Orangeade 4.4 (27) 18 Reviews 3 Photos A refreshing change from lemonade. If you don't care for pulp in your drink, feel free to strain the juice before you add it to the water. Submitted by couldbeanyone Updated on May 4, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 3 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 5 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 8 Yield: 10 cups Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 2 cups water 1 ½ cups white sugar 6 cups water 1 ½ cups freshly squeezed orange juice ⅓ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice Directions Bring 2 cups water and sugar to a boil in a small saucepan; cook at a boil for 3 minutes, stirring to dissolve sugar, and creating a simple syrup. Combine simple syrup, 6 cups water, orange juice, and lemon juice in a large pitcher; refrigerate until cold. I Made It Print 96 home cooks made it! name: couldbeanyone
instructions: Bring 2 cups water and sugar to a boil in a small saucepan; cook at a boil for 3 minutes, stirring to dissolve sugar, and creating a simple syrup.;Combine simple syrup, 6 cups water, orange juice, and lemon juice in a large pitcher; refrigerate until cold.
